direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods generate time-based values (Period and Duration) with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods generate time-based values relative to the current date, though with different units (years for birthday, Period for period).
Both methods handle date ranges and throw exceptions for invalid ranges.
Both methods manipulate time units and generate future or relative time values.
Both methods manipulate time units and generate past or relative time values.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require setting up a time range relative to the current date.
Both methods manipulate time units and generate time-based values.
Both methods handle date ranges and can be used to verify the validity of generated periods.
